vialab.SMT

Class KeyboardZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.PGraphicsDelegate
      • vialab.SMT.Zone
        • vialab.SMT.KeyboardZone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, processing.core.PConstants

    public class KeyboardZone
extends Zone
    KeyboardZone is an implementation of an on-screen keyboard, use this zones addKeyListener(Zone) method to add zones such as TextZone to listen to this keyboard

      • init

        protected void init()
        Description copied from class: Zone
        This function [re]creates the PGraphics for the zone, for advanced use only, override when something needs to be done when the PGraphics is recreated, ie. during a zone resize

        init in class Zone

      • addZoneKeyListener

        public void addZoneKeyListener(Zone zone)
        This is a convenience method, which only adds Zone's as KeyListener
        Parameters:
        zone - The Zone to add to this keyboard as a KeyListener

      • addKeyListener

        public void addKeyListener(java.awt.event.KeyListener listener)
        This adds a KeyListener to listen to this keyboard implementation. Since Zone implements the KeyListener interface, Zone can be passed to this method
        Parameters:
        listener - The KeyListener to add to the keyboard, usually a Zone, which implements the KeyListener interface

      • removeZoneKeyListener

        public void removeZoneKeyListener(Zone zone)
        This is a convenience method, which only removes a Zone from being a KeyListener on this keyboard
        Parameters:
        zone - The Zone to remove from being a KeyListener on this keyboard

      • removeKeyListener

        public void removeKeyListener(java.awt.event.KeyListener listener)
        This removes a KeyListener from this keyboard
        Parameters:
        listener - The KeyListener to remove from the keyboard, usually a Zone, which implements the KeyListener interface
